text: @DineshDSouza I didn't think it was possible for one person to be this consistently stupid. First, the #COVID19 death toll will make flu deaths look like yearly deaths from vending machine malfunctions. Second, being wrong that more people didn't die isn't a bad thing. You're an idiot!
